description:
With the Catian ship en route of collision with the Earth atmosphere, threatening the trapped Catian crews` lives, and Kuune out of commission, Kio is appointed the new captain of the Catian forces. The Dogsians feed misinformation causing all world rockets to be suspended for a planned attack on the ship. Kio and the others set off to abandoned launch base in Russia as part of their plan to aid their friends in space. First a spy out for revenge on Aoi, and an army of NATO soldiers thinking they are terrorists try to stop them.
Source: Wikipedia
